main event: A UFO observation was reported on June 8, 1964, in Dayton, Ohio, involving a pulsating light detected by ground radar.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 1.5 minutes and the object exhibited erratic darting movements,The object appeared as blips on the radar scope, resembling a beacon type display,Each blip lasted from two to six seconds before disappearing,The report included various speculation about the nature of the object, including it potentially being a balloon, satellite, or aircraft,The witness indicated that the object did not behave like any known aircraft in the air force at the time.
witness description: Not directly provided; questionnaire indicates a witness with an experience to report.
